full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (ZHES PA 'DI NI CHE BA @008A *, ,JANG JONG WANG GI DGE BSKOS RTZAS SANG NANG SO CHOS 'PHEL ZHES BYA BAS, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I MDZAD PA BZLOG BSGYUR SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, DE LAS RGYAS PA ZHIG GYIS BSKUL BA LA DOM LDOG PAR, ,DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL BA BYUNG RGYAL DU SONG BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BGYIS PA'I NYES TSOGS KUN LHA MO 'KHOR DANG BCAS BYAMS SHING BZOD PAR GSOL, ,'ON KYANG BGYIS PA KUN LA PHAN DANG BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
